title: HTTPS - Domains - Group
custom_preconds: 1. Users from AD who belong to Group1 and Group2 are synced to the backend
custom_steps:
1. Create SC1 for Group1
2. Create SC2 for Group2
3. Add domains exceptions d1, d2, d3 to SC1
4. Add domains exceptions d4, d5, d6 to SC2
5. Access d1, d2, d3 from a user from Group1
6. Access d4, d5, d6 from a user from Group2
7. Access d1, d2, d3 from a user from Group2
8. Access d4, d5, d6 from a user from Group1
custom_expected:
1. d1, d2, d3 from users of Group1 must be bypassed
2. d4, d5, d6 from users of Group2 must be bypassed
3. d1, d2, d3 from users of Group2 must NOT be bypassed
4. d4, d5, d6 from users of Group1 must NOT be bypassed
